headline: Fluke Corporation Appoints Parker Burke as Group President to lead Connected Reliability Vision
summary: Parker Burke Parker Burke joins Fluke Corporation as Group President Everett, Washington, July 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Fluke Corporation today announced the appointment of Parker Burke as President and Group President of Fortive’s Connected Reliability Group effective July 7, 2025. In this dual role, Parker will lead Fluke and Fluke Reliability in delivering technology and services that help customers around the world reduce downtime, increase safety, and unlock operational resilience. Park
